attributes.action: Let tigers free into the wild from zoos!
attributes.background: The population of tigers in the wild are rapidly decreasing. Tigers don't want to be kept in captivity they wont to be free in the wild. I think animals should have the right to have freedom in the wild.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like it to be illegal to keep a tiger in a zoo in the UK, you could start a new petition asking for that.
